gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 100, Clippers 93
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeated the Clippers, 100-93. Lonnie Walker IV led the way for the Nets with 21 points (8-16 FG), while Mikal Bridges added 10 points, eight rebounds, seven assists and two steals in the victory. Paul George led all scorers with 24 points, along with seven rebounds and three steals for the Clippers in the losing effort. The Nets improve to 4-4 on the season, while the Clippers fall to 3-4.
